mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_employee ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM tbl_employee WHERE MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 3, 4), '%y%m%d')) >= #{monthValue} ORDER BY MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EMP_REG, 3, 4), '%y%m%d')) ASC

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_job J ON E.job_code = J.job_code JOIN tbl_department D ON E.dept_code = D.dept_code JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.branch_code = B.branch_code WHERE E.EMP_NAME = #{empName}

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_job J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN tbl_department D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.BRANCH_CODE = B.BRANCH_CODE WHERE D.DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.SALARY, E.ENROLL_DATE, E.RETIRE_DATE, E.WORK_STATUS, E.GENDER, E.JOB_CODE, J.JOB_NAME, E.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_NAME, B.BRANCH_CODE, B.BRANCH_NAME FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_job J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN tbl_department D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN tbl_branch B ON E.BRANCH_CODE = B.BRANCH_CODE WHERE B.BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}
